body: Maintenance release

*xxh*

* Preserve symbolic links when copying files via `cp`. Thanks @meermanr!

*xxh-shell-xonsh*

* Bumped to xonsh 0.13.3
Package maintenance release

**xxh**
* Added [xxh-plugin-prerun-starship](https://github.com/izissise/xxh-plugin-prerun-starship) to the README. Thanks @izissise!

**xxh-dev**
* The xxh-portable configs were updated

**fish-portable**
* Fish-portable was updated to 3.3.1

**xxh**
* Fix `xxh.zsh` on MacOS. Thanks @Moulick!

**xxh-shell-elvish**
* Alpha version released.

**xxh**
* Added more patterns to support Mac. Thanks @idkjs!
* Fixed uppercase alias definitions of ssh hosts. Thanks @jbreicis!
* Updated README with better english. Thanks @petarvujovic98 and @0xflotus!

**xxh repository**
* Added tests running in case of creating Pull Request.
* Added xxh-portable and xxh AppImage to Github Assets in case of release.

**xxh-shell-xonsh**
* Updated to xonsh 0.9.27

**xxh-shell-fish**
* Updated to fish 3.2.0. Thanks to @frederickjh!

**xxh-dev**
* Changes to support running tests using Github Actions
* Moved from xxh/xxh-dev to [xxh/xxh/xde deirectory](https://github.com/xxh/xxh/tree/master/xde)

**xxh**

* Added extraction case sensitive hostname (#97).

**xxh-shell-xonsh**

* Switched `xonsh.AppImage` to official 0.9.22 build.

**xxh-plugin-prerun-dotfiles**

* Fixed shebang for PyPi packages bin-scripts.
* Added `.xonshrc` template.

**xxh-plugin-xonsh-theme-bar** and **xxh-plugin-xonsh-pipe-liner**

* These plugins deprecated now. Read the instruction in the [README](https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-xonsh-theme-bar).
Package maintenance

**xxh**
* New option `++pexpect-disable` to switch pexpect off to connect faster and stable when you're authorization without password
* Added quotation of SSH arguments (#91) to improve proxy support - thanks @chitoku-k!
* Fix VisualHostKey (#88) - thanks @onokatio!
* Fix host xxh home after config loading (#90) - thanks @onokatio!
* Fix +q option after config loading (#93)

**xxh-plugin-prerun-core**
* Added `xxh-screen` command to run `screen` command with xxh session.

**xxh**
* Added new pipx and homebrew installation methods (thanks to Dario Vladović)
* Added options to force using scp and scp command (thanks to @syndicut)

* Changed pexpect timeout from 3 to 6 seconds to avoid TIMEOUT exception
* Changed realpath to dirname in host info script to avoid MacOS exception
* Changed config example around +if option to clean understanding

* Fixed +i option logic if target directory exists
* Fixed README encoding to install xxh on Windows

**xxh-dev**

* Improved tests for `xxh local`

**xxh**
* `xxh local`: improved logic, added description and shortcut to the readme
* Fixed logic when HOME environment variable is empty

**xxh-dev**
* New tests for `xxh local`
* Improved entrypoint run

**xxh**
* New experimental `xxh local [xxh arguments]` command to building xxh environment wherever you are now. It builds hermetic xxh environment on the host where you run this command.
* Improved local xxh home logic
* Fixed uploading prerun plugins when using scp

**xxh-shell-xonsh**
* Added loading `.xonshrc` file from `$XXH_HOME` if exists

**xxh-dev**
* New tests for `xxh local`

**xxh**
* Disabled Windows check

**xxh-shell-xonsh**
* Renamed from xonsh-appimage to xonsh
* AppImage logic extremely improved by Valentin Niess
* Speed of first and next runs increased
* Hermetic logic improved
* pip works more naturally

**xxh-shell-bash**
* Renamed from bash-zero to bash

**xxh**
* Improved dot files support
* Improved wiki page - https://github.com/xxh/xxh/wiki

**xxh family**

New prerun plugins!
* sudo - https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-prerun-sudo
* dotfiles - https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-prerun-dotfiles
* docker - https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-prerun-docker
* python - https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-prerun-python

**xxh**
Short url support for github. You can install packages from any repo and branch from github:
```
xxh +I https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-example
xxh +I https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-example/tree/mybranch
```

**xxh**
* Prerun plugins support. Prerun plugin is a bash script which will be run on entrypoint stage immediately before shell running. It can help to bring some config files before running shell.

[**xxh-plugin-prerun-mc**](https://github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-prerun-mc)
* First prerun plugin for Midnight Commander which creates `~/.config/mc/ini` file if it is not exists.

**xxh**
* Fix reading from `config.xxhc`

**xxh**
* Fix `+L`
* Omit stack trace when SIGINT

**xxh-shell-zsh**
* Bump to zsh-bin 3.0.1

**xxh**
* Fix rsync: missing `core` directory

**xxh-plugin-fish-ohmyfish**
* New plugin!

**xxh**
Github branch support when install packages:
```
xxh +I xxh-shell-example+git+https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-example/tree/mybranch
```

**xxh and all xxh-shells**

New HOME and [XDG](https://specifications.freedesktop.org/basedir-spec/basedir-spec-latest.html) logic:

1. `xxh user@myhost` - hermetic environment:

    ```
    $XXH_HOME=/home/user/.xxh
    $HOME    =/home/user/.xxh
    $XDG_HOME=/home/user/.xxh
    ```

2. `xxh user@myhost +hhh '~'` - semihermetic environment because if you run a tool that doesn't support XDG it will write to user home:

    ```
    $XXH_HOME=/home/user/.xxh
    $HOME    =/home/user
    $XDG_HOME=/home/user/.xxh
    ```
3. `xxh user@myhost +hhh '~' +hhx '~'` - xxh works like ssh:

    ```
    $XXH_HOME=/home/user/.xxh
    $HOME    =/home/user
    $XDG_HOME=/home/user
    ```

**xxh-plugin-bash-ohmybash**
* New plugin for xxh-shell-bash-zero!

**xxh**
* Fix directory names for package installation

**xxh.bash**
* Fix seamless mode

**xxh-dev**
* New tests for bash

**xxh**
Added `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME` support (https://ploum.net/207-modify-your-application-to-use-xdg-folders/).
Note you need to move your current config to `~/.config/xxh/config.xxhc`.
Fixed seamless mode
Maintenance

**xxh**
* Fix `+hh` and `+hhh` logic

This major xxh release contains breaking and significant changes:
* Default `$HOME` on the host was set to `$XXH_HOME` (`~/.xxh` by default). It makes xxh session more hermetic. If you want to stay at default `~/` on the host use `+hhh "~"` argument (you can add it to config `~/.xxh/.xxhc`).
* xxh packages directory renamed from `~/.xxh/xxh` to `~/.xxh/.xxh` to make `$XXH_HOME` more clear. You should reinstall your xxh packages using `xxh +RI <package>` and update your hosts by using `+if` argument.
* All xxh family updated along with changes above

**xxh**
* Fix files permissions

**xxh.bash**
* Fixed shell name
Maintenance

**xxh**
* Final step to portable xxh binary
* Improved packages operations logic

**xxh**
* Fix host info checks

**xxh**
* Next step to static portable xxh binary

**xxh**
* Next step to static building as portable xxh binary

**xxh-shell-fish**
* New xxh-shell for fish - portable static liked version of fish

**xxh**
* Fix package installation from xxh repo

**xxh-shell-fish**
* New experimental fish portable shell. Try:
```
xxh +RI xxh-shell-fish
xxh myhost +s xxh-shell-fish
```

**xxh**
* Fix packages operations

**xxh**
* Added `xxh.bash` for seamless mode
* Fix package operations

**xxh-shell-fish-appimage**
* Added AppImage extraction mode on systems without FUSE

**xxh**
* Added support openssh versions <7.6
* Added realpath check
* Fix "local variable 'host_xxh_home' referenced before assignment"

**xxh**
* Added `+c SSH_COMMAND` argument to support ssh wrappers like [repassh](https://github.com/dyuri/repassh)

**xxh**
* Complete support AppImage
* Added package management arguments `+I +L +RI +R`
* New package source string format `xxh-(shell|plugin)-<name>+(git|path)+(url|path)`. 
Example: `xxh myhost +I xxh-shell-sample+git+https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-sample +s xxh-shell-sample`.

This allows use package management arguments in config `~/.xxh/.xxhc`:
```
hosts:
  myhost:                     # settings for myhost
    -p: 2222                    # set special port
    +s: xxh-shell-zsh           # set zsh shell                         
    +I: xxh-plugin-zsh-ohmyzsh  # install xxh-plugin before connect
    +e: ZSH_THEME="clean"       # set ohmyzsh theme
```

**xxh**
* Fix xxh home and config logic

**xxh**
* Fix `xxh +I` behavior

**xxh**
* Removed `xxhp` tool
* New xxh arguments to manage packages:
  ```
  usage: xxh [+I xxh-package ...] [+L] [+RI xxh-package ...] [+R xxh-package ...]
  ```
  It's the next step to `xxh.AppImage`.

**All xxh-packages**
* Fix quiet mode

**xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage**
* Updated to xonsh 0.9.15.
* Fix portable pip bin directory. Now you can `xxh myhost +s xonsh` and `pip install xxh-xxh`.

**xxhp**
* Shell commands now pure python. Next step to AppImage

**xxh**
* Fix rsync on macos

**All shells and plugins**
* Build file on bash now. It's the next step to portable xxh version.

**xxhp**
* Fix sh build

**xxh-shell-zsh-romkatv**
* New incredible [statically-linked, hermetic, relocatable Zsh](https://github.com/romkatv/zsh-bin) from Roman Perepelitsa

**xxhp**
* Fix name check
xxh now on pure python. It's the first step to binary and AppImage versions.

**xxh**
* Fix `+hhr` argument

**zsh and bash-zero entrypoints**
* Added `-C` (big C) argument to get base64 encoded command

**xxh.zsh**
* Seamless mode for xonsh: `source xxh.xsh myhost`

**zsh-portable**
* New zsh portable build on alpine with musl

**all entrypoints**
* Verbose mode

**xxh**, **xxhp**
* Build script could be written on xsh, zsh, fish, sh

**xxh-dev**
* Big improvement: users for every shell

**xxh**
* Fix xxh shell download logic

**xxhp**
* Added quiet mode

**xxh-shell-zsh**
* Suppress minor warnings

**xxh**
New name for pip package: `xxh-xxh`. The command to install or upgrade:
```
python3 -m pip install --upgrade xxh-xxh
```

**xxhp**
Now you can list packages:
```
xxhp ri  xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage  xxh-plugin-xonsh-bar
```

**xxh**
* Fix `source xxh.zsh myhost` magic command

**xxh-shell-zsh**
* Set zcompdump path
* Suppress minor warnings

**xxh**
* New `+heb` argument to set pre execution code

**xxh-shell-zsh**, **xxh-plugin-zsh-ohmyzsh**
* Full reinvention of environment variables transporting from local to remote host. Now it is works as natively as possible.

**xxh**
* New seamless mode support for xonsh. Now you can run `source xxh.xsh myhost` and all environment variables which you liste in `xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage/env` file will be on host.

**xxh**
* The big step forward in seamless mode. New `source xxh.zsh myhost` command for zsh allows to pass the environment from local to remote host. If you're using Oh My Zsh framework it allows to pass `ZSH_THEME` and `plugins` without any manual changes. Read env part of [xxh-plugin-zsh-sample](github.com/xxh/xxh-plugin-zsh-sample).

**xxh-shell-osquery**
* New osquery shell!

**xxh**
* New `+e NAME=VAL` argument put environment variables to the host

**xxh-shell-bash-zero**, **xxh-shell-zsh**, **xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage**
* Added environment variables support in entrypoint

**xxh-plugin-zsh-ohmyzsh**
* New env var `XXH_ZSH_PLUGIN_OHMYZSH_ZSH_THEME` (UPD: replaced to `ZSH_THEME` in 0.5.5)
* New env var `XXH_ZSH_PLUGIN_OHMYZSH_PLUGINS` (UPD: replaced to `plugins` in 0.5.5)

**xxh**
* New `+q` quiet mode
* Added example to config.xxhc
* Added details to messages

**xxh-shell-bash-zero**
* Fix loading plugins

**xxh-plugin-bash-vim**
* Fork-ready vim plugin for xxh-shell-bash-zero

**xxh**
* New logic: by default xxh will use your shell (xonsh, zsh or fish)
* New logic: by default xxh will upload plugins to host only for chosen shell (reduce overhead)

**xxh-dev**
* Added retries for tests

**xxh**
* New `+hhr` option to remove host xxh directory after disconnect

**xxhp**
* New `xxhp` package manager

**xxh-dev**
* README fixes

**All repos**
* License to BSD-2-Clause

**xxh**
* Fix help message

**xxh-shell-bash-zero**
* New bash-zero xxh shell added!

**xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage**
* New `xonsh.AppImage` build from xonsh master with fresh fixes
* Fix AttributeError (https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage/issues/1)

**xxh-shell-ALL**
* Fix: `curl` now follows redirect

**xxh-dev**
* New tests for bash-zero and zsh
* New `xde-test-fast` script

**xxh**
* New argument `+hf, ++host-execute-file` - execute script file placed on host and exit.
* New argument `+hc, ++host-execute-command` - execute command on host and exit.
* Fix scp uploading for dot files

**xxh-dev**
* New zsh basic tests
* Fix building order
* New CentOS container

**xxh-shell-sample**
* New arguments description and examples

**xxh-shell-zsh**
* New entrypoint `-c` (command) and `-f` (file)
* Fix entrypoint libs and scp case

**zsh-portable**
* New entrypoint with libs path and scp fixes

**xxh-shell-fish-appimage**
* Fix AppImage link
* Entrypoint check improved

**Features**
* Final step to reduce overhead while building and uploading plugins. Now plugins should have `build.xsh` script to make clean and portable `build` directory. 

**Development environment**
* [Dev and test environment](https://github.com/xxh/xxh-dev) have extremely updated to work and test with group of xxh repos.

**Update**
* Please update your local `~/.xxh/xxh` and use `+if` to update hosts.

This release has final step to make xxh shell agnostic.

**Update**
You should full reinstall xxh:
1. `python3 -m pip install --upgrade xonssh-xxh`
2. Remove or rename `~/.xxh` directory
3. Run `xxh` without arguments to create new `~/.xxh` directory
4. Install your plugins to `~/.xxh/xxh/plugins`. The shell will be installed during first connection.

**Features**
* Shell agnostic structure
* Avoid removing pip packages when xxh install in forced mode (`+if`) #24
* Add xxh dotfile with default config #46

**Improvements**
* Faster rsync uploading

**Development and test**
* New dockerfiles, xde arguments
* Plugins tests
Maintenance 0.4.0

The big step forward to support any shell. This major release affected on xxh, xxh-dev and all plugins. Xonsh entrypoint is a distinct repository now (https://github.com/xxh/xxh-shell-xonsh-appimage). 

The best way to update:
1. Upgrade xxh from pip
2. Remove or rename `~/.xxh`
3. Create `~/.xxh/plugins` and checkout the plugins from repos
New repo url: https://github.com/xxh/xxh

**Features**

* Seamless way to install xontribs using `xpip install`

**Dev and test environment**

* Improved xontrib tests in https://github.com/xonssh/xxh-dev

**Fixed**

* Wrong formatting fixed

**Dev and test environment**

* Added scripts for building xonsh.AppImage - https://github.com/xonssh/xxh-dev/tree/master/xonsh-AppImage
Fix 0.3.2: directories behavior in `xontrib-install`
New `xontrib-install` alias allows using xontribs in xxh to workaround https://github.com/xonsh/xonsh/issues/3463

**Features**
* In case of password authentication xxh will ask password once #31
* More ssh native behavior for password authentication

**Dev and test environment**
* `xde test` now have options to show failed command
* Short names for containers

**Code**
* First step to reduce sshpass dependency #30
* Global code reformat

**New features**
* Password auth with `+P password` and `+PP` options

**Fixes**
* `xonsh.AppImage` error about `which` fixed in https://github.com/niess/linuxdeploy-plugin-python/pull/19
* In AppImage extracted mode using more right way of running xonsh

**Code cleaning**
* Using path strings more naturally for xonsh scripts

**Dev and test environment**
* Added Arch Linux container with tests on password auth in [xxh-dev](https://github.com/xonssh/xxh-dev)
pip fixed
`xpip` now works
Code cleaning
Faster getting host info

name: 0.2.8a
body: First step to new installation process of plugins
First step to new installation process of plugins

* Optimization getting host info
* Optimization plugins loading
* Test xxh-plugin-pipe-liner (xonssh/xxh-tests)
* Cleaning
Minor package update

* #2 Review and reduce connections
* #14 Allow execute remote script
* #8 Testing environment improvements (xonssh/xxh-tests)
* Log messages to stderr
Arguments fixed
Help readability improved

* Support ssh options #7
* Review and reduce count of information connections before final connect #2
* Installation without wget and rsync #2
* Testing environment (xonssh/xxh-tests) #8

* Packaging: `pip install xonssh-xxh`
* License to BSD
* Safe update mode
* Snail art
* Code cleaning
